bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with zhong jiang 腫強 , swollen and stiff. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry fu long gan 伏 龍肝 quoting Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 36: 治重舌，口中涎出，水漿不收 … 又方：用伏龍肝 研如粉，以牛蒡汁調傅之，效 , “Another recipe for saliva flowing from the mouth, and when [the patient] refuses to ingest water as well as viscous liquids, mix with niu ban juice and apply externally. Effective” , writes: 重舌腫木，伏龍 肝末，牛蒡汁調塗之 , “The tongue feels heavy, is swollen and wooden . [Take] fu long gan powder, mix with niu bang juice and apply externally. Effective”.
